name: World Vision
description: Focuses on child sponsorship and community development to address poverty and injustice worldwide.

name: Samaritan's Purse
description: Provides emergency relief and development assistance to communities in need around the world.

name: Compassion International
description: Offers child sponsorship programs and support to alleviate child poverty globally.

name: Operation Blessing
description: Provides humanitarian aid, disaster relief, and community development support worldwide.

name: Food for the Hungry
description: Works to end poverty and provide sustainable solutions to vulnerable communities globally.

name: Catholic Relief Services (CRS)
description: Supports international humanitarian and development efforts with a focus on Catholic values.

name: World Relief
description: Empowers local churches to serve vulnerable communities through relief and development programs.

name: Hope International
description: Provides microfinance and savings services to alleviate poverty and promote entrepreneurship.

name: Samaritan Ministries
description: A Christian healthcare sharing ministry that provides medical cost-sharing among its members.

name: Medical Teams International
description: Delivers medical and dental care, humanitarian aid, and disaster relief around the world.

name: Open Doors USA
description: Supports persecuted Christians worldwide by providing aid, advocacy, and awareness.

name: The Salvation Army
description: Provides a range of social services, including shelter, addiction recovery, and disaster relief.

name: World Challenge
description: Supports global missions, education, and humanitarian work to alleviate suffering and share the Gospel.

name: American Bible Society
description: Promotes the Bible's availability and engagement to help people experience its life-changing message.

name: Prison Fellowship
description: Offers faith-based programs and support for prisoners, ex-offenders, and their families.

name: Bread for the World
description: Advocates for policies to end hunger and poverty in the United States and around the world.

name: Mercy Ships
description: Operates hospital ships that provide free medical care and community development in developing nations.

name: Wycliffe Bible Translators
description: Focuses on translating the Bible into languages that do not yet have access to Scripture.

name: World Renew
description: Addresses poverty and injustice by partnering with communities to create lasting change.

name: Christian Aid Ministries
description: Provides disaster relief, humanitarian aid, and community development assistance worldwide.
